name: Robo's Attack
description:
Oh no robots are taking over the world and their boss hasn't been found. His bots have taken over an old battlefield, and are planning to turn it into there hidout.

Your Mission Is To eliminate All The Robots to save the battlefield  But It Won't Be Easy Or Will It!

Tips

Stay Out Of The Robo's Sight

Make Sure To Find The JetPack 

When Your Health Bar Is Out = Game  Over

When all enemies are eliminated = You win

Good Luck!

Credits:

Game Design: KC Games

Icon Design: Woulstain Creado
